item.title: Swob
item.description: Stay connected With SmswithoutBorders We hardly know when we are going to find ourselves without an internet connection; Whether in an event, in school, traveling to a new place or migrating to a remote area, natural disaster, in a protest, etc. We are pleased to introduce SMSWithoutBorders(SWOB). SWOB is a messaging app developed by Afkanerd Technologies Ltd. It allows messages to be sent to online platforms such as Telegram, Gmail, and Twitter without an active internet connection.
